vsParam:
Ah~ What a lovely day.
It's a good time to take a walk——

Ah ah ah!?
Wh-what's that sound!?

It's from the atrium!
Let's go check it out!!

Ahhhh... The Academy's wall is collapsing!
What's going on...

Oh no, I'm sorry.
We lost control and hit it too hard during our training...

Sorry... I got carried away,
and didn't realize the surroundings.

Hmm... You were practicing sword, right?
How could the wall collapse like that!?

It must be caused by the collision of swords that we
couldn't imagine! Uh~ I really want to watch it here!

No need!
You'll get hurt, OK!?

OK, perfect timing, you guys.
Please fix this wall.

Wait, Tandrion.
I don't think the wall should be fixed casually.

Plus it was damaged by us.
I don't think we should leave the fixing to them. That would be too—

Relax, don't care so much.
Anyway, thank you, guys!
Hmm... How could he do that...
I am sorry, but that's the kind of person he is...

No, you don't have to apologize.
He has a good reputation. I think his heart is in the right place.

After all, the responsibility is still ours...
But I'd be very happy if you are willing to help.

Alright... Anyway, we should fix the wall first,
or it will impact the normal operation of the Academy.

Leave the wall to me. I'm sorry,
but can you help me prepare the materials for repairing the wall?

Sure!
We'll get the materials ready as soon as possible!
Sterk! We brought you the materials!

Uh, thank you. Put them down there.
I'll take it from here.

Hmm... C-can you really do this... alone?
Let us help you!

This is also part of a knight's job in Arland.
I'm quite proficient in such repairing work.

A knight needs to mend the wall?
Ah, Sterk starts repairing so quickly...

S-so focused...
He looks like a professional craftsman!

Sterk... How should I put it,
Knights of Arland are really versatile...

We shall leave this to Sterk.
Our help would only slow him down.
You are right... Let's not disturb him, [px].
